duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive technology projects through their life cycle, ensuring technical solutions are sound and aligned to business goals.
Manage projects through all stages of the implementation process, collaborating with cross-functional leaders, end-users, and vendor teams.
Lead formal requirements gathering sessions, manage scope and deliverables, and oversee delivery of final product in the form of Technology Projects.
Conduct reviews and track progress of the project, report and present to project stakeholders.
Enhance established Project Management methodology, deliverables, standards, and procedures and utilization of project budget.
Assist the executive team with ongoing process improvements and initiatives.
Gather technical requirements such as functional specifications and Systems integration requirements.
Leverage project management tools like Jira / Confluence to diligently organize project tasks.
Develop comprehensive project plans complete with budgetary information and resource requirements, and manage them throughout the duration of the project.
Lead and facilitate meetings, conference calls, and presentations with internal and external teams.
Develop the project charter, capacity, effort and cost estimates, resource requirements, work breakdown structure, and schedule.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree, preferably in management information systems, software engineering, or computer science with 2+ years’ experience in website management, design development, and coding
